  • Add AuditableEntityInterceptor for entity auditing

Refactored the IEntity interface to include a placeholder for future auditing functionality. Removed the unused and empty Interceptors class to improve code clarity.

Added logic to populate auditing fields (CreatedBy, CreatedAt, LastModifiedBy, LastModified) in the AuditableEntityInterceptor. Included an extension method to detect changes in owned entities.

These changes centralize auditing logic, improve maintainability, and prepare the codebase for future enhancements. (web admin) - (0092223)
